comments.body: Its not too late yet. I agree its awkward but it is also a common pattern we have across all of our staging repos. The problem is exacerbated because its a shallow repo. I had deliberately kept the common pattern but if we think is not a pattern we want to keep I can change it.

I think it'd be better to change to one of:
* k8s.io/cloudprovider
* k8s.io/cloud-provider/cloudprovider

But I'm not 100% sure it is worth the effort if this is ready to go.
